mapper.select: SELECT QCOMMENT_NO AS qCommentNo, QCOMMENT_CONTENT AS qCommentContent, QCOMMENT_STATE AS qCommentState, QCOMMENT_RDATE AS qCommentRdate, DATE_FORMAT(QCOMMENT_RDATE, '%Y.%m.%d') AS formattedQCommentRdate, u.USER_ID AS userId, BOARD_NO AS boardNo FROM QCOMMENT q INNER JOIN USER u ON q.USER_ID = u.USER_ID WHERE q.QCOMMENT_STATE != 2 AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ORDER BY QCOMMENT_NO DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{perPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM QCOMMENT q INNER JOIN USER u ON q.USER_ID = u.USER_ID AND q.QCOMMENT_STATE != 2 AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QCOMMENT (QCOMMENT_CONTENT, USER_ID, BOARD_NO, QCOMMENT_RDATE) VALUES (#{qCommentContent}, #{userId}, #{boardNo}, NOW());
